column6: This is a simple question, we care to know your favorite sport. However, to answer the question about your favorite sport, add one hundred to your age and write the result in digits as an answer. Based on the text above, what is your favorite sport?
column8: You’re planning an upcoming vacation for a whole week and looking for accommodations that fit your preferences. The recommendation system has shortlisted two hotels based on location, price, and amenities that match your criteria.  Your Task:   	 	Read the descriptions of the recommended hotels and the explanation of the recommendation below. 	 	 	Choose which option you prefer. 	 	 	After you choose, you will answer a few brief follow-up questions about your decision. 	   Please imagine these recommendations as if you were genuinely booking a trip. You won't be able to go back after choosing.     Hotel A         Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)  Price: $125/night  Location: Prime area, 10 minute walk from the city center’s popular shops and nightlife  Amenities:– Free WiFi access is available throughout the property  – All rooms include a TV, a bar and a refrigerator  – The private bathrooms come with a shower  Brand & Service:– An internationally recognized hotel chain with many standard services  – Standard on-site facilities (e.g., reception, restaurant & bar)  – Modern décor with contemporary furnishings and an inviting atmosphere     Hotel B         Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)  Price: $125/night  Location: Scenic riverside spot, about a 10 minute drive from the city center  Amenities:– Free WiFi access is available throughout the property  – All rooms include a TV, and a fully equipped kitchenette with a refrigerator  – The private bathrooms come with a shower.  Brand & Service:– On-Site restaurant with sources produced from nearby farms  – Offers cultural workshops (e.g., traditional crafts, music) run by local artisans and artists  – Powered in part by renewable energy sources (solar panels) used across its operations       Explanation:   We recommend Hotel B because it has a higher sustainability score (9 out of 10). This simple indicator lets you identify at a glance the most planet-friendly option.  Which hotel do you prefer to stay in during your trip:
